fulltext:
Khiem TA 
Email: khiem2991@gmail.com 
Phone: +84 94455 4578. 
Skype ID: khiem291. 
Year of birth: 1991. 
Address: Tan Phu District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. 
Nationality: Vietnamese. 
PROFILE SUMMARY: 
Has 4+ years experience with Python programming and data analytics. 
Core Responsibilities: collecting, storing, processing, and analyzing data generated from 
database. Research, design, implement and validate machine learning models. API design 
and expose API backend. 
Interests research: Big data, Blockchain, Large scale system. 
PROFESSIONAL SKILLS 
Storage and data analytic: Hadoop, Apache Spark. 
Message management: AMQP (RabbitMQ), MQTT (Google pub/sub). 
Data visualization: Kibana, Matplotlib. 
Programming languages: proficient with Python, Javascript on Node Js. 
Database: MySQL, PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, BigQuery. 
Platforms: Linux, Window server, Google cloud platform. 
DevOps tools: Docker, Jenkins, VMWare Vsphere. 
Source code version control: Git, SVN. 
Automation test libraries: Robot-framework, Pytest, Selenium, Sikuli. 
Networking: MCSA, CCNA. 
Web technologies: HTML; ExpressJs/ Flask/ Django/ Connexion framework; Swagger 
document (OAS). 
Tools and related technologies: Nifi, Fluentd, Jupyter, KNIME, Weka, SciPy (Numpy, 
Pandas, ...), Scikit-learn ... 
1 
EXPERIENCE 
June 2018 - now 
FPT Software, High tech park Ho Chi Minh. 
Senior software engineer 
- Develop web backend expose API with Flask/Django framework, driven 
by Swagger. 
- Create source code structure, API design. 
- Develop unit test and integrate with CI/CD (Jenkins). 
- Data preprocessing. 
- Optimize import data file with large size to database. 
Data management, a project for the purpose of managing data import 
into the database system (PostgreSQL) and the authentication of the 
data access. 
Oct 2017 - June 2018 
(8 months) 
CCSS startup, Tan Binh district. 
Data scientist 
- Collecting data from sensors in BTS (Base transceiver station) by Nifi 
and push to Hadoop file system. 
- Solve data analytic problems in telecommunication with Spark: 
Electricity, Air conditioner statistics description, clustering station based 
alarm, correlation between temperature and air conditioner. 
- Visualization data analytic results with Kibana, Google spreadsheet, 
Matplotlib. 
- Expose RESTful API analytic service with javascript on NodeJs. 
INAProject, a system analytic Big data for telecommunication 
infrastructure. 
May 2015 - Aug 2017 
(2 years 4 months) 
Terralogic Company, Quang Trung Software Park. 
Senior Automation test Engineer 
- Process development & improvement automation scripts. 
- Propose web automation testing strategies. 
- Estimate and monitor schedule/progress. 
2 
- Develop automation testing use Python, Selenium, XPath.Sikuli, 
TestNG, Protractor, Selenium, WebdriverIO, Mocha, Chai, Allure. 
WiNG managed family of Access Points, controllers provide a 
centralized distribution of high performance, resilient wireless and data 
services to remote locations with the scalability. 
MPact, a platform for Mobile Marketing, shopping is centered on 
customer needs. Base on Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy technologies. 
Sep 2013 - Apr 2015 
(1 years 8 months) 
Arrive Technologies, ETown Cong hoa. 
Verification engineer. 
- Preview software/hardware specification & design documents. 
- Manual/auto test by using scripts tcl, python. 
- Define verification plan, coverage plan based on Chip functionality, 
standard and application. 
- Verify Chip at system level following standards as ITU, MEF, IEEE. 
Calypso, a switch solution which supports new telecom technologies: 
Carrier Ethernet Y1731, OAM MPLS-TP CCM, LB, LT, DM, LM.  
EDUCATION 
2006 - 2009 
Le Khiet gift high school. 
2009 - 2013 
University of Sciences Ho Chi Minh, VN National University. 
BSc, Faculty of Electronic and Telecommunication. 
Honor class. Rank: Distinction 
2016 - 2018 
Bach Khoa University, Ho Chi Minh, VN National University. 
Master's course, 
Management Information Systems. 
3 
ACHIEVEMENT AND AWARDS 
2015 
2014 
2011 
2009 
Terralogic, SNAP award for excellence contribution & innovation. 
English (intermediate): TOEIC 650. 
Won the second prize contest win technology in Ispace. 
Light Dreams Scholarship of Tuoi tre newspaper. 
REFERENCES 
Employer 
Quan Phi, 
Project manager. 
Terralogic company, Quang Trung software park. 
Professor Linh Truong,  
Director of INALab, CCSS company 
Faculty of Informatics, TU Wien, Austria. 
4 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
